exceptions.tactic: apply (R_complete (fun P => F (fun z => ball z eps))).
exceptions.exn: In environment F : (C -> Prop) -> Prop Ffilt : ProperFilter F Feps : forall eps : posreal, exists x : C, F (ball x eps) eps : posreal P : R -> Prop z : C The term "ball z eps" has type "C_UniformSpace -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "Prop".

original: intros F Ffilt Feps eps. apply (R_complete (fun P => F (fun z => ball z eps))). - apply (Build_ProperFilter (fun P PF => (filter_ex F) (fun x => filter_ex Feps (fun y => PF (ball x eps) y)))). + intros P Q FP FQ. apply filter_and; apply filter_ex; auto. + intros P Q HPQ FP. apply filter_ex; apply HPQ; auto. - intros eps'. specialize (Feps eps'). destruct Feps as [x FBall]. apply (filter_ex F) with x. auto.
